data.title: NCN Magazine on LinkedIn: Honourable Chief Minister MK Stalin Inaugurates Tamil Nadu Global…
data.text:
The Indian election results have set the stage for transformative shifts in the investment landscape. 📈 Curious about what this means for you as an investor? Portfolio Manager Abhinav Mehra at our partner Chikara Investments LLP was quoted reflecting on the significant shift in market sentiment. Dive into this analysis from Portfolio Adviser for more insights on the evolving market dynamics in India. #India #equities #Emergingmarkets https://lnkd.in/guzzpa8r

💰 𝐕𝐨𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐬 𝐛𝐞𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐝𝐢𝐜𝐭: Pre-Budget #expectations from Madhur Singhal, Managing Partner – Private capital, Praxis Global Alliance. 💼 #UnionBudget 2024 promises a brighter future for private investments in India! Despite a global slowdown, investors remain optimistic about India’s growth story. With global LP allocations expected to reach US$100B by 2030, #Budget 2024 will play a crucial role in developing the private investment ecosystem. Domestic capital participation is rising rapidly both in private equity and credit. India should seize this opportune moment to create large capital pools that can capitalize on the Indian growth engine. Watch this space for more #PraxInsights on the #Budget24. #PreBudgetWithPraxis #PraxInsightsOnBudget

Over the last few budgets, the #government has made one thing clear: though its “#growth-centricity” in the #development vision remains, it is not at the cost of distributive #justice and #sustainability. In the long run, it needs to be kept in mind that while the #Indian economy has largely encountered consumption-driven #growth so far, there is an utmost need to garner private #savings to promote #investments. From Dr. Nilanjan Ghosh

We, at BMR Legal Advocates are pleased to share that an article titled, "Interim Budget 2024-25: A turning point for investment treaties", authored by our Partner, Mukesh Butani, has been published by Business Standard. The column weighs in on the growth story of India in the last decade, and crystallises assertions around the importance of Bilateral Investment Treaties (BITs) to exemplify development-induced reforms. The article can be accessed at: https://lnkd.in/gJqWADKB Business Standard #budget2024 #indiabudget #indiabusiness #indianeconomy #interimbudget #budgetexpectations #india

What do you expect?? What is in for common man? What is in for #Infrastructure, #Geotechnical, #Civil industries?? An Interim Budget will be presented on February 1 2024 The forthcoming #Budget2024 holds significant importance, especially as the #Indian #economy maintains its position as the world's fastest-growing major economy. With a focus on sustaining this momentum, Budget 2024 is anticipated to implement measures that support India's progress toward achieving a $5 trillion economy. In the face of global challenges such as geopolitical tensions and uncertainties resembling wartime conditions, it becomes crucial for Budget 2024 to enhance India's economic self-reliance. #IndianEconomy #Financialyear20242025 #Aatmanirbharbharat #FinanceMinister #NirmalaSitharaman

Pradeep Gupta, Executive Director and India head of Investments, Lighthouse Canton shares his expert views on India's latest budget and how it showcases a strategic blend of fiscal prudence and growth-oriented policies. The Government's clear top-down policy making approach on nine priority areas will drive consistent resource allocation. With a revised fiscal deficit target of 4.9%, India continues its commendable track record of financial discipline. The budget also positively addressed critical areas such as rural recovery and boosting consumption through agricultural packages and tax reliefs. The continued focus on investment in capex, manufacturing, infrastructure, housing, and defense, signals long-term growth. Measures to attract FDI and the abolition of the Angel Tax are positive steps for startups and capital inflow. Despite market reactions to Securities Transaction Tax and Capital Gains changes, the budget is seen as targeted and strategic, promoting parity and simplifying the regime. Click on the link now to read his full quote: https://lnkd.in/dkTqahyw Shilpi Chowdhary, Prashant Tandon, Sumegh B., Audrey Tang, Sanket Sinha, Sunil Garg, Antoine Bracq, Dinesh Gogia, Charu Sheel Kunwar, Himangshu Baruah, Manas Chadha, Varun Kalsi, Charlene L., Harish Chowdhary, Atul Bhardwaj #Budget2024 #Insights #LighthouseCanton #Insights #IndiaBudget2024

#EconomicSurvey2024 | Prime Minister Narendra Modi said that the Budget for 2024-25 is a crucial component of the '#AmritKaal,' as it will establish a solid groundwork for realizing the vision of a developed India by 2047. PM Modi also called on political parties to transcend party politics for the next four and a half years. #Budget2024 Here are the six areas highlighted by the Economic Survey that need to be addressed for driving growth:

Today, while presenting the Interim Union Budget 2024, Hon’ble Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman stated that Digital Public Infrastructure (DPI), has played a key role in the formalization of the economy. But what is DPI and how will it formalize India's economy? 🤔 Find out in our blog! https://linke.to/hCc4fe #IndiaBudget2024 #DigitalPublicInfrastructure
